Ok guys, check this out: http://www.ksky.ne.jp./~sumie99/habaki.html
 
look at the third type of habaki, a gold and silver one are illustrated
called 'koshi-Yujo'. 
 
Who was Yujo and is this a type of 'cat scratch' habaki?
 
- Matt

Barry,
Yes, my point exactly in my first reply to Matt.  

Jim

-------------
Why
scratches on gold and not shakudo??  I can only think that shakudo is
"shibui" -
subdued, whereas gold is "hade" - flashy - and needs to be subdued, the
scratches doing this to a "T".

Barry Thomas.
